15 specialized AI experts with distinct personalities and analytical approaches. Weighted voting system based on: historical accuracy (40%), recent performance (30%), consistency (20%), confidence calibration (10%). Merit-based rotation system removes underperforming experts. Competition framework tracks expert performance across all prediction categories.

Self-healing learning loop with continuous performance monitoring every hour. Automated expert rotation when accuracy drops below 70% threshold. Adaptation triggers include: performance decline detection, systematic bias correction, new pattern incorporation. Closed-loop feedback system ensures continuous improvement.

WebSocket-based live updates with sub-second latency. SportsData.io connector with intelligent caching (live scores: 1min, team stats: 1hr, injuries: 30min, betting odds: 5min). Enhanced prediction service integrates real data with AI council consensus. Dynamic prediction adjustment based on current game conditions.
